news.title: NeurIPS 2025 Acceptance
news.content: ğŸ“‹ Two papers were accepted to NeurIPS 2025: one Spotlight (first author) and one Poster (second author).

news.title: Joined KAIST

news.content: ğŸ’ ["MOFFlow: Flow Matching for Structure Prediction of Metal-Organic Frameworks"](https://arxiv.org/abs/2410.17270), has been accepted to *2025 ICLR*.
